email.title: Future of Blockchain Competition - Registration Deadline
email.sponsor:
**Register by end of play Friday 1st November for the Future of Blockchain Competition!**
The deadline is fast approaching! Make sure you register now! Participants have 3 months after registration to build a blockchain startup or answer a technical challenge! There are over Â£100k in cash prizes and also investment up for grabs!
Find out more and register here! https://www.futureofblockchain.co.uk/register
